verses.verse: Now Sarai <S%H8297><s%> Abram's <S%H87><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> him no <S%H3808><s%> children <S%H3205><s%>: and she had an handmaid <S%H8198><s%>, an Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Hagar <S%H1904><s%>.

And Sarai <S%H8297><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Abram <S%H87><s%>, Behold now, the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath restrained me <S%H6113><s%> from bearing <S%H3205><s%>: I pray thee, go in <S%H935><s%> unto my maid <S%H8198><s%>; it may <S%H194><s%> be that I may obtain children <S%H1129><s%> by her. And Abram <S%H87><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of Sarai <S%H8297><s%>.

And Sarai <S%H8297><s%> Abram's <S%H87><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Hagar <S%H1904><s%> her maid <S%H8198><s%> the Egyptian <S%H4713><s%>, after <S%H7093><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> had dwelt <S%H3427><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> her to her husband <S%H376><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> to be his wife <S%H802><s%>.

¶ And he went in <S%H935><s%> unto Hagar <S%H1904><s%>, and she conceived <S%H2029><s%>: and when she saw <S%H7200><s%> that she had conceived <S%H2029><s%>, her mistress <S%H1404><s%> was despised <S%H7043><s%> in her eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And Sarai <S%H8297><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Abram <S%H87><s%>, My wrong <S%H2555><s%> be upon thee: I have given <S%H5414><s%> my maid <S%H8198><s%> into thy bosom <S%H2436><s%>; and when she saw <S%H7200><s%> that she had conceived <S%H2029><s%>, I was despised <S%H7043><s%> in her eyes <S%H5869><s%>: the LORD <S%H3068><s%> judge <S%H8199><s%> between me and thee.

But Abram <S%H87><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Sarai <S%H8297><s%>, Behold, thy maid <S%H8198><s%> is in thy hand <S%H3027><s%>; do <S%H6213><s%> to her as it pleaseth thee <S%H2896><s%> <S%H5869><s%>. And when Sarai <S%H8297><s%> dealt hardly with <S%H6031><s%> her, she fled <S%H1272><s%> from her face <S%H6440><s%>.

¶ And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> found her <S%H4672><s%> by a fountain <S%H5869><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, by the fountain <S%H5869><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> to Shur <S%H7793><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Hagar <S%H1904><s%>, Sarai's <S%H8297><s%> maid <S%H8198><s%>, whence <S%H335><s%> camest thou <S%H935><s%>? and whither wilt thou go <S%H3212><s%>? And she said <S%H559><s%>, I flee <S%H1272><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of my mistress <S%H1404><s%> Sarai <S%H8297><s%>.
And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her, Return <S%H7725><s%> to thy mistress <S%H1404><s%>, and submit <S%H6031><s%> thyself under her hands <S%H3027><s%>.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her, I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> thy seed <S%H2233><s%> exceedingly <S%H7235><s%>, that it shall not be numbered <S%H5608><s%> for multitude <S%H7230><s%>.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto her, Behold <S%H2009><s%>, thou art with child <S%H2030><s%>, and shalt bear <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>, and shalt call <S%H7121><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>; because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath heard <S%H8085><s%> thy affliction <S%H6040><s%>.

And he will be a wild <S%H6501><s%> man <S%H120><s%>; his hand <S%H3027><s%> will be against every man, and every man's hand <S%H3027><s%> against him; and he shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of all his brethren <S%H251><s%>.

And she called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that spake <S%H1696><s%> unto her, Thou God <S%H410><s%> seest me <S%H7210><s%>: for she said <S%H559><s%>, Have I also here <S%H1988><s%> looked <S%H7200><s%> after him <S%H310><s%> that seeth me <S%H7210><s%>?
Wherefore the well <S%H875><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Beer-lahai-roi <S%H883><s%> <S%H2416><s%>; behold, it is between Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> and Bered <S%H1260><s%>.

¶ And Hagar <S%H1904><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>: and Abram <S%H87><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> his son's <S%H1121><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>, which Hagar <S%H1904><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%>, Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>.

And Abram <S%H87><s%> was fourscore <S%H8084><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, when Hagar <S%H1904><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> to Abram <S%H87><s%>.
